name: ELEX WooCommerce Abandoned Cart Recovery with Dynamic Coupons
author: ELEXtensions

sections.description:
Recover abandoned carts with a series of predetermined, rule-based reminder emails that include dynamically generated smart discount coupons. Almost eighty percent of website visitors who reach the shopping cart page ultimately abandon their purchases. No matter how seamless your website is and how smooth the purchasing process is, some amount of cart abandonment is inevitable. If you’re in the eCommerce industry, you’re probably familiar with the phenomenon of abandoned shopping carts, which can be both annoying and annoyingly common.

Features

  • Get in-depth data on cart amounts abandoned and recovered
  • Configure email rules and triggers to automate cart abandonment emails
  • Send abandoned cart emails with smart discount coupons
  • Get the details for every abandoned and recovered cart
  • Choose WooCommerce order status to indicate that a previously abandoned cart has been recovered
  • Enable guests who haven’t signed up for an account to retrieve their abandoned carts
  • Receive an email notification whenever a cart is recovered
  • Create unique email templates with coupon associations for reminder emails
  • View complete email logs

Premium version walkthrough Video

Premium Version Features

For complete list of features and details, Please visit ELEX WooCommerce Abandoned Cart Recovery with Dynamic Coupons.

  • Set a timer for when a cart is considered abandoned and erase all previous data.
  • GDPR message.
  • Filter Reports.
  • Restriction on IP addresses, email ids, and domains from capturing the abandoned cart.

ELEX Premium Plugins You May Be Interested In

  • WooCommerce Dynamic Pricing and Discounts Plugin
  • Wholesale & Role Based Pricing
  • WooCommerce Advanced Bulk Edit Products, Prices & Attributes
  • WooCommerce Request a Quote Plugin

About ELEXtensions

We, Team ELEXtensions are a group of WordPress and WooCommerce enthusiasts with a vision to solve genuine problems related to WordPress & WooCommerce stores. We offer a wide variety of extensions for WooCommerce. We have premium extensions related to many domains including Shipping, Pricing, Payments and Customer Support.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it ! you can now configure the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.1.2

  • Made Compatible with WordPress 6.6
  • Made Compatible with WooCommerce 9.1

1.1.1

  • Made Compatible with WooCommerce 8.9

1.1.0

  • Made Compatible with WordPress 6.5
  • Made Compatible with WooCommerce 8.8
  • Product Id and Category Filter for Dynamic Coupon
  • Product Category Filter for Email Rule

1.0.9

  • Made Compatible with WordPress 6.4.3

1.0.8

  • Redirect Unsubscribe link to site home url

1.0.7

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 8.3
  • Made Compatible with Block based Checkout

1.0.6

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 8.3
  • Fixed an issue with Coupon Background Image in mail
  • Fixed backslash issue with Email Content
  • Tested OK with WordPress 6.4

1.0.5

  • Improved UX (New flow for cart abandonment)
  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 8.0
  • Tested OK with WordPress 6.3
  • Tested OK with PHP 8.2
  • Made Compatible with HPOS

1.0.4

  • Fixed few issues.

1.0.3

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 7.7

1.0.2

  • Tested OK with WordPress 6.2

1.0.1

  • Tested OK with WooCommerce 7.5

1.0.0

  • Initial Version release.
